sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function Sorted(props) { const {name, mascot, head, ghost, founder, values} = props return(

{name}!

Mascot: {mascot}

Head of House: {head}

House Ghost: {ghost}

Founder: {founder}

Qualities: {`${values[0]}, ${values[1]}, ${values[2]}, ${values[3]}`}

) } export default Sorted
